title: How do we learn or study theory subjects quickly in days? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all to learn or study about something quickly …i)we have to clear our mind from everything (although it is difficult to achive n it needs time) ii)decide what you want to study /learn n think about it . ii)start reading curiously…!yes it is possible to find interest in almost every subject . Trust me . Next steps i dont want to explain …watch this three video n include it on your daily study. #These three video is about 3 great study technique for productive learning n memorising. 1)feynmann technique  2)mind palace technique  3)promodoro technique  I hope This techniques help you.please follow tminimum 2 weeks .then u can see the change. #Thank you

Just focus and make short goals. Say you have 25 chemistry chapters and 15 days, then first you need to know how much you can take up in a day… make short timings like from 7–9 am study one chapter and again another chapter in the afternoon may be. But keep at least 2 days for revision . …Be.ware you cannot expect to succeed if you are applying this for class 11–12 and higher studies and here you must have deep understanding about the topic and you need weeks to capture the chapters properly..
